chapter.text: to-sin-mim
a ayato prakasita kitabani che
te lokona imana na lavava para kadaca tame tamara prana gumavi deso
jo ame icchata to temana mate akasa manthi ko'i evi nisani utarata, ke jeni same te lokoni garadano jhuki padati
ane temani pase rahamana (allaha) taraphathi je pana navi sikhamana avi, a loko tena virodha karanara bani gaya
te loko'e juthalavyum che, have temana mate najikamam ja temani janakari avi pahoncase, jeni sathe te'o maskari kari rahya che
sum te loko'e dharati para joyum nathi ke, ame temam dareka prakarani uttama jodi'o kevi rite upajavi che
ni:Sanka temam nisani che ane te loko manthi vadhare padata loko imana nathi lavata
ane kharekhara tamaro palanahara te (allaha) ja vijayi ane dayalu che
ane jyare tamara palanahare musa a.Sa.Ne pokarya, ke tame atyacari koma tarapha ja'o
phira'aunani koma pase, sum te daravavala nahim bane
musa a.Sa.E kahyum, mara palanahara! Mane to dara lage che ke kyanka te'o mane juthalavi (na) de
Ane marum hrdaya tanga tha'i rahyum che, mari jabana calati nathi, basa! Tum haruna tarapha pana (vahi) utara
ane mara para temano eka bhulano (davo) pana che, mane dara lage che ke kyanka te'o mane mari na nankhe
allaha'e kahyum, avum kyareya nahim thaya, tame banne amari nisani'o la'ine ja'o, ame pote sambhalanara, tamari sathe che
tame banne phira'auna pase ja'ine kaho, ke kharekhara ame allaha taraphathi mokalavamam avya che
ke tum amari sathe isra'ilana santanone mokali de
phira'aune kahyum, ke sum ame amare tyam tarum balapanamam palana-posana na karyum? Ane taro ghano samaya amari sathe na vitavyo
pachi tem kama karyum (ane) kari cukyo, ane tum krtaghni che
musa a.Sa.E javaba apyo ke mem te kamane te samaye karyum hatum, jyare ke mane satyamarganum jnana na hatum
pachi tamara bhayathi hum tamari pasethi bhagi gayo, pachi mane mara palanahare adesa ane jnana apyum. Ane mane tena payagambaro manthi kari didho
taro upakara mara para sum a ja che, je tum janavi rahyo che ke tem isra'ilana santanone dasa banavi rakhya che
phira'aune kahyum “rabbul alamin” (srstino palanahara) sum che
musa a.Sa.E kahyum, te akaso, dharati ane te banne vacceni dareka vastu'ono palanahara che. Jo tame visvasa karata hoya
phira'aune potana aju-bajuna lokone kahyum ke sum tame sambhalata nathi
musa a.Sa.E kahyum, te tamaro ane tamara purvajono palanahara che
phira'aune kahyum, (loko) tamaro a payagambara, je tamari tarapha mokalavamam avyo che, te to kharekhara pagala che
musa a.Sa.E kahyum, te ja purva ane pascima ane te banne vacceni dareka vastuno palanahara che, jo tame bud'dhi dharavata hova
Phira'auna kaheva lagyo, sambhala! Jo tem mane chodine bija ko'ine pujya banavyo to, hum tane kedi'o sathe nakhi da'isa
musa a.Sa.E kahyum, jo hum tari same ko'i spasta nisani la'i avum
phira'aune kahyum, jo tum saca loko manthi hova, to tene lava
musa a.Sa.E (te ja samaye) potani lakadi nakhi didhi, je acanaka khullo ajagara bani ga'i
ane potano hatha khencyo to, te pana te ja samaye dareka jonara mate sapheda camakadara dekhava lagyo
phira'auna potani ajubaju saradarone kaheva lagyo, bha'i a to khuba ja janakara jadugara che
a to icche che ke potana jadu vade tamane tamari dharati parathi kadhi muke, kaho! Have tame sum adesa apo cho
te sau'e kahyum, ke tame tene ane tena bha'ine mahetala apo ane dareka saheromam potana lokone mokali do
je tamari pase janakara jadugarone la'i ave
pachi eka nakki karela divase, dareka jadugarone bhega karavamam avya
ane dareka lokone kahi devamam avyum ke tame pana sabhamam hajara rahejo
jethi jo jadugaro vijaya prapta kare, to ame temanum ja anusarana karisum
jadugaro avi phira'aunane kaheva lagya, ke jo ame vijaya melavi la'i'e to sum amane kami inama malase
phira'aune kahyum, ham, jo evum thayum to tame mara khasa loko bani jaso
musa a.Sa.E jadugarone kahyum, je kami tamare nankhavum hoya, nakhi do
te'o'e potana dorada ane lakadi'o nakhi didhi ane kaheva lagya ke, phira'aunana ijajatana soganda! Kharekhara ame ja vijaya melavisum
have musa a.Sa.E pana potani lakadi medanamam nakhi didhi, jene te ja samaye temana juththa karatabane gali javanum sarum karyum
a jotaja jadugara tarata ja sijadamam padi gaya
Ane te'o'e spasta kahi didhum ke ame to allaha samagrasrstina palanahara para imana lavya
etale ke musa a.Sa. Ane haruna a.Sa.Na palanahara para

phira'aune kahyum, ke mari paravanagi pahela ja ana para imana la'i avya? Kharekhara a ja tamaro moto (saradara) che, jene tamane saune jadu sikhavadyum che, tamane hamana ja khabara padi jase. Soganda che, hum hamanam ja tamara hatha ane pagane virud'dha disa manthi kapi nakhisa. Ane tamane saune phansi'e latakavi da'isa
temane kahyum, kami vandho nathi, ame to amara palanahara tarapha pacha pharavavala ja che
etala mate ke ame sau prathama imana lavanara ban'ya, amane asa che ke amaro palanahara amara badha ja papone mapha kari dese
ane ame musane vahi kari ke ratani ratamam ja mara banda'one kadhine la'i ja, tamaro sauno picho karavamam avase
phira'aune saheromam potana lokone mokali didha
ke ni:Sanka a juthana loko thodanka ja che
ane amane a loko sakhata gus'se kari rahya che
ane kharekhara amarum jutha motum che, temanathi cetine rahenara
chevate ame te'one bagica ane jharana vade
ane khajana vade uttama jagya'othi kadhi mukya
avi ja rite thayum ane ame te vastu'ona varasadara isra'ilana santanane banavya
basa! Phira'aunana loko surya ugatani sathe ja temano picho karava lagya
basa! Jyare banne'e ekabijane jo'i lidha, to musana mitro'e kahyum, kharekhara ame to pakada'i gaya
musa'e kahyum, kyareya nahim, kharekhara maro palanahara mari sathe che, je jarura mane marga batavase
ame musa tarapha vahi utari ke dariya para potani lakadi mara, basa! Te ja samaye dariyo phati gayo ane panino dareka bhaga mota parvato jevo tha'i gayo
Ane ame te ja jagya'e bijane najika lavi didha
ane musa a.Sa.Ne ane temana dareka mitrone chutakaro apyo
pachi bija lokone dubadi didha
kharekhara amam moti sikhamana che ane temana manthi vadhare padata loko imanavala nathi
ane ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara ghano ja pratisthita ane dayalu che
te lokone ibrahima a.Sa.No kis'so pana sambhalavi do
jyare temane potana pita ane potani komane kahyum ke tame koni bandagi karo cho
temane javaba apyo ke murti'oni bandagi kari rahya che, ame to temani khuba ja bandagi karanara che
temane kahyum ke jyare tame temane pokaro cho, to sum te'o sambhale che
athava tamane phayado ane nukasana pana pahoncadi sake che
te loko'e javaba apyo, a (kami nathi janata), ame to amara purvajone avi rite karata joya
temane kahyum, kami khabara che je'oni bandagi tame kari rahya cho
tame ane tamara purvajo te sau mara satru che
allaha ta'ala sivaya, je samraga srstino palanahara che
jene marum sarjana karyum ane te ja mane margadarsana ape che
te ja che, je mane khavadave ane pivadave che
ane jyare hum bimara padum to mane tandurasta pana te ja kare che
ane te ja mane mrtyu apase ane phari jivita karase
ane jenathi asa che ke badalana divase te mara papone mapha kari dese
he mara palanahara! Mane phensalo karavani sakti apa ane mane sadacari loko manthi kari de
ane marum sanmana pachalana lokomam baki rakha
mane ne'amatovali jannatana varasadaro manthi banava
ane mara pitane mapha kari de, kharekhara te pathabhrasta loko manthi hatam
Ane te divase, jyare loko phari vara jivita karavamam avase, mane apamanita na kara
je divase dhana ane santana kami kama nahim ave
parantu phayadavalo te ja hase, je allaha ta'alani same salamativalum dila la'ine avase
ane daravavala'o mate jannata atyanta najika kari devamam avase
ane pathabhrasta loko mate jahannama jahera kari devamam avase
ane temane savala karavamam avase ke jemani tame bandagi karata rahya te loko kyam che
je allaha sivaya bija loko hatam, sum te'o tamari madada kare che? Athava ko'i badalo la'i sake che
basa! Te sau ane badha pathabhrasta loko jahannamamam undha nakhavamam avase
ane iblisana laskaro pana tyam
andaro'andara jhaghado karata kahese
ke allahana namana soganda! Kharekhara ame to spasta rite pathabhrasta hatam
jyare tamane allaha-samagrasrstina palanaharana bhagidara samaji betha hatam
ane amane to, te vidrohi sivaya bija ko'i'e pana pathabhrasta nahatam karya
have to amara mate ko'i bhalamana karanara pana nathi
ane na to subhecchuka mitra
jo kadaca eka vara phari amane javanum malatum to, ame saca imanavala bani jatam
a drsya kharekhara eka jabaradasta nisani che. Temana manthi vadhare loko imana lavavavala nathi
ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara ja vijayi, dayalu che
nuhani komana loko'e pana payagambarone juthalavya
jyare ke temana bha'i nuha a.Sa.E kahyum, ke sum tamane allahano bhaya nathi
sambhalo! Hum tamari tarapha allahano nisthavana payagambara chum
basa! Tamare allahano dara rakhavo jo'i'e ane mari vata manavi jo'i'e
Hum tamari pase tena mate ko'i valatara nathi icchato, maro badalo to phakta srstina palanahara (allaha) pase ja che
basa! Tame allahano dara rakho ane marum ajnapalana karo
kaume javaba apyo, ke sum ame tara para imana lavi'e tarum ajnapalana to nabala loko'e karyum che
payagambare javaba apyo, mane sum khabara ke te'o pahela sum karata hatam
temano hisaba to mara palanaharana sire che, jo tamane samajana hoya
hum imanavala'one dhakka maranaro nathi
hum to spasta rite saceta karanaro chum
te loko'e javaba apyo, ke he nuha! Jo tum cheto na rahyo to kharekhara tane paththaro vade mari nakhisum
nuha a.Sa.E kahyum ke he mara palanahara! Mari komana loko'e mane juthalavi didho
basa! Tum mari ane temani vacce sacota nirnaya kari de ane mane ane imanavala'one chutakaro apa
chevate ame tene ane tena sathi'one bhareli hodimam (savari karavi) chutakaro api didho
bija dareka lokone ame dubadi didha
ni:Sanka amam moti sikhamana che, temanthi vadhare padata loko imanavala na hatam
ane ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara te ja che, atyanta dayalu
adana loko'e pana payagambarone juthalavya
jyare temane temana bha'i huda a.Sa.E kahyum, ke sum tame darata nathi
hum tamara mate nisthavana payagambara chum
basa! Allahathi daro ane mari vata mano
hum tena mate tamari pase kami valatara nathi icchato. Maro badalo to samagra srstina palanahara pase ja che
sum tame eka tekari para ramata-gamata mate alisana (imarato) banavi rahya cho
ane ghana majabuta mahelo banavi rahya cho, jane ke tame hammesa ahinya ja raheso
Ane jyare ko'ine saja apo cho to sakhata ane atyacara sathe apo cho
allahathi daro ane marum ajnapalana karo
tenathi daro, jene te vastu dvara tamari madada kari jene tame jano cho
tene tamari madada kari, dhana ane santana dvara
bagica ane jharanam dvara
mane to tamari babate mota divasani yatanano bhaya che
te loko'e kahyum ke tame sikhamana apo athava na apo amara mate sarakhum che
a to juna lokoni adata che
ane amane kyareya yatana apavamam nahim ave
jo ke adana loko'e huda a.Sa.Ne juthalavya, etala mate ame te lokone nasta kari didha, kharekhara amam nisani che ane temana manthi vadhare padata loko inkara karanara hatam
ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara vijayi, dayalu che
samudana loko'e pana payagambarone juthalavya
temana bha'i saliha a.Sa.E temane kahyum ke sum tame allahathi nathi darata
hum tamari tarapha avatarita karelo nisthavana payagambara chum
to tame allahathi daro ane mari vata mano
hum ana mate tamari pase ko'i valatara nathi icchato. Marum valatara to phakta samagra srstina palanahara (allaha) pase che
sum a vastu'omam, je ahinya che, tamane amasta ja chodi devamam avase
etale ke a bagica'o ane jharana
ane a khetaro tatha khajurona bagica'omam, jemana guccha narama che
ane tame parvatone kotarine garva mate makano banavi rahya cho
basa! Allahathi daro ane marum ajnapalana karo
nidaratathi hada vatavi janara'onum kahyum na mano
je rajyamam vidroha phelavi rahya che ane potano sudharo nathi karata
temane kahyum ke basa! Tame te loko manthi cho, jemana para jadu kari devamam avyum
Tame to amara jeva ja manavi cho, jo tame saca cho, to ko'i camatkara batavo
payagambare kahyum che. A che untadi, pani piva mate eka varo teno ane eka nakki karela divase pivano varo tamaro
(khabaradara) tene kharaba irada sathe hatha pana na lagavaso, nahito eka mota divasani yatana tamari pakada kari lese
to pana te'o'e tena paga kapi nankhya, basa! Te'o'e dilagiri vyakta kari
ane yatana'e temani pakada kari lidhi, ni:Sanka amam sikhamana che ane temana manthi vadhare padata loko imanavala na hatam
ane ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara ghano ja jabaradasta ane dayalu che
lutani komana loko'e pana payagambarane juthalavya
temane temana bha'i luta a.Sa.E kahyum, sum tame allahano dara nathi rakhata
hum tamara mate nisthavana payagambara chum
basa! Tame allahathi daro ane marum ajnapalana karo
hum tamari pasethi ana mate ko'i valatara nathi icchato, marum valatara to phakta allaha pase che, je samagra srstino palanahara che
sum tame duniyana loko manthi puruso sathe (sambhoga) karo cho
ane tamari je stri'one allaha'e tamara jodaka banavya che, temane chodi do cho, parantu tame hada vatavi janara ja cho
te loko'e javaba apyo, ke he luta! Jo tu anathi vancita na rahyo to kharekhara taro desanikala karavamam avase
lute kahyum ke hum tamara karyathi khuba ja naraja chum
mara palanahara! Mane ane mara gharane anathi bacavi le je a loko kare che
basa! Ame tene ane tena (juthane) bacavi lidha
eka vrdva stri sivaya, te pachala rahi janara loko manthi tha'i ga'i
pachi ame bija darekane nasta kari didha
Ane ame temana para eka khasa prakarano varasada varasavyo. Basa! Ghano ja kharaba varasada hato, je saceta karavamam avela loko para varasyo
a vatamam pana kharekhara sikhamana che, temana manthi pana vadhare padata loko musalamana na hatam
ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara te ja che, vijayi ane dayalu
ayakahavala'o'e pana payagambarane juthalavya
jyare temane su'aiba a.Sa.E kahyum, ke sum tamane dara nathi
hum tamara mate nisthavana payagambara chum
allahathi daro ane marum ajnapalana karo
hum ana mate tamari pase kami valatara nathi icchato, marum valatara samagra srstina palanahara pase che
mapa-tola purepurum apo, ochum apanara na bano
ane saca trajava vade tolo
lokone temani vastu ochi karine na apo. Nidarata sathe dharatimam vidroha karata na pharo
te allahano dara rakho, jene tamarum ane tamara purvajonum sarjana karyum
te loko'e kahyum, tame te loko manthi cho jemana para jadu kari devamam ave che
ane tum to amara jevo ja eka manavi che. Ane ame to tane jutha bolanara'o manthi samaji'e chi'e
jo tum saca loko manthi hoya to amara para akasana tukada phenki batava
kahyum ke maro palanahara khuba sari rite jane che je kami tame kari rahya cho
karanake te loko'e temane juthalavya to, temane chanyadana divasana prakope pakadi lidha, te bhare divasano prakope hato
ni:Sanka amam moti sikhamana che ane temana manthi vadhare padata loko musalamana na hatam
ane kharekhara tamaro palanahara te ja che, vijayi ane dayalu
ane ni:Sanka a (kura'ana) samagra srstina palanahare avatarita karela che
ane nisthavana pharisto la'ine avyo che
Tamara hrdaya para avatarita thayum che, ke tame saceta karanara'o manthi tha'i java
spasta arabi bhasamam che
agalana payagambaroni kitabomam pana a kura'ananum varnana che
sum te loko mate a nisani purati nathi ke kura'anani satyatane to isra'ilana vidvano pana jane che
ane jo ame a (kura'ana)ne ko'i gera'araba para avatarita karata
basa! Te temani same a kura'ana padhato to tene na samajata
avi ja rite ame papi'ona hrdayamam a inkarane nankhi didhum
te loko jyam sudhi du:Khadayi yatanane jo'i na le, tyam sudhi imana nahim lave
basa! Te yatana temani pase acanaka avi jase, temane ana vise bhana pana nahim hoya
te samaye kahese ke sum amane thodika mahetala apavamam avase
basa! Sum a loko amari yatana mate utavala kare che
sarum, e pana janavo ke jo ame te lokone ketalaya varsa sudhi labha leva da'i'e
pachi temane te yatana avase, jeni dhamaki apavamam avati hati
to je kami pana a loko karata rahya, te manthi kami pana phayado nahim pahonce
ame saceta karanarane mokalya vagara ko'i vastivala'one nasta nathi karya
sikhamana mate. Ane ame atyacara karavavala nathi
a kura'anane setana nathi lavya
te ana mate saksama nathi, na to te a babate sakti dharave che
parantu te to sambhalavathi pana vancita kari devamam avya
basa! Tame allaha sivaya ko'ine na pokaro, jethi tame pana saja pamanara bani java
potana sambandhi'one saceta kari do
je pana imana lavi tamarum anusarana kare, temani sathe namratabharyum vartana karo
jo a loko tamari avajna kare to tame jahera kari do ke, hum te karyothi alago chum je tame kari rahya cho
Potano sampurna bharoso vijayi, dayalu allaha para rakha
je tamane joto rahe che, jyare tame ubha thava cho
ane sijada karavavala'oni vacce tamarum pharavum pana
te khuba ja sambhalanara ane khuba janakara che
sum tamane hum janavum ke setana koni tarapha ave che
te dareka juththa ane papi'o tarapha ave che
aphava'o sambhalavi de che ane temana manthi vadhare padata loko juththa che
kavi'onum anusarana te loko kare che, je pathabhrasta che
sum tame nathi joyum ke kavi jangalomam matha pachadata phare che
ane te loko je kahe che te karata nathi

imanavala ane satkarya karanara sivaya ane allahana namanum smarana vadhare karyum ane potana para thayela atyacara pachi badalo lidho, je loko'e atyacara karyo che, te loko pana najikamam jani lese ke keva padakhe palatase
